page.title: 08A MODERN KEELBY BEDROOM
page.content: I LOVE TO PLAY IN MY BEDROOM BECAUSE THERE IS SO MUCH TO DO.NORMALLY IF I AM ALONE I PLAY ON MY PORTABLE TELEVISION WHICH SERVES THREE PURPOSES.THE TELEVISION IS USED WITH MY ATARI GAMES MACHINE,COMPUTER AND ON ITS OWN AS INTENDED. .MY MOST FAVOURITE POSSESION IS MY STEREO DECK AND CASSETTES. THE MOST USELESS OBJECT THAT I OWN IS MY CODE KIT.MY MOST EXPENSIVE POSSESION IS MY COMMODORE 64 COMPUTER WHICH IS VERY USEFUL AND ENJOYABLE.MY BEDROOM IS NOT VERY TIDY BECAUSE THERE IS SO MUCH STUFF AROUND.THERE ARE SO MANY ELECTRICAL GADGETS THAT MY DAD HAD TO BUY SPECIAL 4-WAY PLUGS TO FIT THE SOCKETS.EVERYTHING IN MY BEDROOM IS RED AND WHITE BECAUSE I AM A LIVERPOOL F.C. SUPPORTER.I HAVE LIVERPOOL WALL-PAPER AND RED CURTAINS WHICH DECORATE MY SPACIOUS ROOM .
